title:
Characteristic Gluing with $\Lambda$: III. High-differentiability
  nonlinear gluing
authors: Piotr T. Chru\'sciel, Wan Cong, and Finnian Gray
abstract:
We prove a nonlinear characteristic $C^k$-gluing theorem for vacuum
gravitational fields in Bondi gauge for a class of characteristic hypersurfaces
near static vacuum $n$-dimensional backgrounds, $n\ge 3$, with any finite $k$,
with cosmological constant $ \Lambda \in \mathbb{R}$, near Birmingham-Kottler
backgrounds. This generalises the $C^2$-gluing of Aretakis, Czimek and
Rodnianski, carried-out near light cones in four-dimensional Minkowski
spacetime.
